quiz_questions.instruction_text: How much experience do you have with
answer_description: - I've mostly done student or practice projects
- I've contributed to the design of at least one actual product
- I've created the visual design for multiple projects over a few years
- I've produced a wide variety of designs in different industries over many years
quiz_questions.followup: Share a few samples that represent your best Visual Design work (mockups, illustrations, animations, etc.)

quiz_questions.instruction_text: How much experience do you have with
answer_description: - I've mostly done student or practice projects
- I've contributed to the design of at least one actual product
- I've contributed to multiple projects over a few years
- I've solved a wide variety of problems in different industries over many years
quiz_questions.followup: Share a case study that represents your best UX Design work

quiz_questions.instruction_text2: methods that you have experience with:
section_text: Any other types of user research (e.g. task analysis, card sorting, field studies, etc.)

quiz_questions.question1: On my projects, I've written the final copy that gets shipped to customers:
answer_description: - I never write the final copy that ships to customers
- I have some experiemce writing the final copy
- I have lots of experience with this

quiz_questions.instruction_text: How much experience do you have with writing
answer_description: - I'm familiar with the basics of HTML, CSS, and/or JavaScript, but I don't write much code
- I can build a basic front end, but it's not my area of expertise
quiz_questions.followup: Share a any samples of your code (optional)

quiz_questions.instruction_text: How much experience do you have with the following aspects of
section_text: Workflow - maximizing your design teamâ€™s output and efficiency
Tooling - Managing the software and tools that your design team uses
Design Systems - Contributing to a design system
Education - helping members of your design team sharpen their skills
Advocacy - promoting and advocating for design within your company

excluded_skills.instruction_text: For each of the following, rate how much experience you have with it and how much you enjoy it:
section_text: Advocating for design within your company
